messages.content: Give me and my candidate your vote on Thursday 8th June and I will: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family. Don’t risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else. Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

I grew up in Redcar. I'm appalled how our town has been neglected. I believe we can do better and have a much brighter future. Labour take Redcar for granted. I am NOT a career politician. I will fight your corner. Together we can reinvigorate Redcar. Only a vote for me will give Redcar an MP working side by side with Theresa May to get a fair share of the benefits of Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country.
Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.
Always stand up for you and your family.
